label: ham
subject:
Re: svn commit: samba r23663 - in branches: SAMBA_3_0/source/smbd
	SAMBA_3_0_26/source/smbd
body: And of this kind I spoke as the intelligible, although in the search after it the soul is compelled to use hypotheses; not ascending to a first principle, because she is unable to rise above the region of hypothesis, but employing the objects of which the shadows below are resemblances in their turn as images, they having in relation to the shadows and reflections of them a greater distinctness, and therefore a higher value.
